test.name: TC1 - Verify play music is correct

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Verify menu name ui youtube account page
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'Xpath=//android.widget.LinearLayout[1]/android.widget.RelativeLayout/android.widget.LinearLayout/android.widget.Button' contains exactly text 'ONE COOL COOL'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.google.android.youtube:id/manage_account"]' contains exactly text 'Manage your Google Account'.

kw.name: Exit For Loop If
